channel.title: Need help with Dementhium 634 Source!
channel.description:
Hello, I am getting a error when I run the source, what am i doing wrong or do i need to delete? Cause I think it's the MYSQL... if so... how do I get rid of it because the file on the download page is broken :s. Please help with the following error:
[code][Cache] Loading cache... [Cache] Loaded cache! [MapXTEA] Loaded 1502 map XTEA key(s) [PacketManager] Loading packet handlers... [PacketManager] Loaded 60 packet handlers. com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(DualStackPlainSocketI mpl.java:69) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.ja va:337) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(AbstractPlainSocket Impl.java:198) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java :180) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:157) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:391) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:425) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:241) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:579) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:221) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 45 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:579) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:221) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.PlayerLoader.<init>(PlayerLoader.java:49) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:95) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) com.mysql.jdbc.CommunicationsException: Communications link failure due to under lying exception:
** BEGIN NESTED EXCEPTION **
java.net.ConnectException MESSAGE: Connection timed out: connect
STACKTRACE:
java.net.ConnectException: Connection timed out: connect at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.connect0(Native Method) at java.net.DualStackPlainSocketImpl.socketConnect(DualStackPlainSocketI mpl.java:69) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.doConnect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.ja va:337) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connectToAddress(AbstractPlainSocket Impl.java:198) at java.net.AbstractPlainSocketImpl.connect(AbstractPlainSocketImpl.java :180) at java.net.PlainSocketImpl.connect(PlainSocketImpl.java:157) at java.net.SocksSocketImpl.connect(SocksSocketImpl.java:391) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:579) at java.net.Socket.connect(Socket.java:528) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:425) at java.net.Socket.<init>(Socket.java:241) at com.mysql.jdbc.StandardSocketFactory.connect(StandardSocketFactory.ja va:173) at com.mysql.jdbc.MysqlIO.<init>(MysqlIO.java:267) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2739) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:579) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:221) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56)
** END NESTED EXCEPTION **
Last packet sent to the server was 1 ms ago. at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.createNewIO(Connection.java:2814) at com.mysql.jdbc.Connection.<init>(Connection.java:1553) at com.mysql.jdbc.NonRegisteringDriver.connect(NonRegisteringDriver.java :266) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:579) at java.sql.DriverManager.getConnection(DriverManager.java:221) at org.dementhium.mysql.DatabaseManager.establishConnection(DatabaseMana ger.java:44) at org.dementhium.mysql.impl.Highscores.<init>(Highscores.java:24) at org.dementhium.model.World.<init>(World.java:96) at org.dementhium.model.World.<clinit>(World.java:72) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) [World] Loading World... [ClanManager] Loading clans.... [ClanManager] Loaded 42 clans. [AreaManager] Loading areas... [AreaManager] Loaded 48 areas. [NPCDropLoader] Loading drops... [NPCDropLoader] Loaded 2649 drops [SpellContainer] Loading magic spells... [SpellContainer] Loaded 43 magic spell handlers. [SpecialAttackContainer] Loading special attacks... [SpecialAttackContainer] Loaded 37 special attacks. [DialogueManager] Loading dialogues... [DialogueManager] Loaded 35 dialogues. [DialogueManager] Loading NPC dialogue ids... [DialogueManager] Loaded 1 NPC dialogue ids. [ShopManager] Loaded 24 Shops Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: org/dementhium/model/ map/ObjectManager$2 at org.dementhium.model.World.load(World.java:125) at org.dementhium.RS2ServerBootstrap.main(RS2ServerBootstrap.java:56) Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: org.dementhium.model.map.ObjectMana ger$2 at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:366) at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(URLClassLoader.java:355) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(URLClassLoader.java:354) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:423) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Launcher.java:308) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(ClassLoader.java:356) ... 2 more[/code]
Thank you, please don't flame me.. i'm new to moparscape a little o.O.

item.title: Need help with Dementhium 634 Source!
item.dc:creator: @Pazaz Pazaz
item.description:
@Pazaz wrote:

skiller8860:

I’m not just starting off, I know how to code java by looking at it… just not errors that show up in run.bat I find [pi] highly easy to code… but atm i’m looking for a updated RSPS… :l

Java errors are self-explanatory, They tell you the line of the error, And the reason.
Yeah, Try a [PI] Source if you wish.
You can contact me
on Skype @ ps3playerr
or XFire @ TheMaleScripter
or Steam @ sergio0076

Read full topic

item.title: Need help with Dementhium 634 Source!
item.dc:creator: @Pazaz Pazaz
item.description:
@Pazaz wrote:

[quote=“skiller8860, post:7, topic:418245”][quote author=Pazaz link=topic=520790.msg3783496#msg3783496 date=1318666009]

That version the link is broken that’s what I meant when I said, “The file is broken” it makes it a little more difficult… v.v. Any other suggestions?

Hmm…

  1. Remove it yourself (Not recommended for newbies)
  2. Get another HD Source
  3. Wait for a fixed link (May take a while)
    [/quote]

Know any other sources SIMILAR to that source? Or is that the most updated RSPS?[/quote]
I doubt it’s the most updated, But I must admit, It looks nice. If you are just starting off in the RSPS World, Try a 317. It’s easier and provides the basic knowledge of an RSPS. (Also, It’s possible to load a 508+ Cache in a 317 Server/Client)

Read full topic
